DOC.brief_summary: A single rising dose study to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of MK-1006 in Japanese participants with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM). The primary hypothesis of the study is that single doses of MK-1006 will be sufficiently safe and well tolerated, based on the assessment of clinical and laboratory evaluations and adverse experiences, in Japanese participants with T2DM.
DOC.brief_title: MK-1006 Single Dose Study in Japanese Type 2 Diabetes Patients (MK-1006-005)
DOC.criteria: Japanese male or female between 20 to 64 years of age Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes Patient is being treated with diet and exercise alone or single oral antihyperglycemic agent Subject has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus Subject has a clinical diagnosis of glaucoma Subject has donated blood or participated in another clinical study in the past 12 weeks Subject is a regular user of any illicit drugs or has a history of drug, including alcohol, abuse in the past 6 months
